blueprint.description: Installs jq (the defacto standard command-line JSON processor) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [jq](https://github.com/stedolan/jq) is like sed for JSON data. You can use it to slice and filter and map and transform structured data with the same ease that sed, awk, grep and friends let you play with text.
blueprint.name: jq
blueprint.title: jq
